Author: cinnamonbicycle
Text: It's not worth chasing that standard. I've learned that there's always going to be someone worse. No matter how "bad" you get, there will be some sick milestone you haven't reached. If you're suffering, you need help. If your quality of life is inhibited by this illness, you deserve recovery. You'll never reach the finish line of being sick, but you can reach wellness.

Author: carbslut
Text: I feel like this just means you have an ever-so-slightly better grasp on reality than the rest of us.
